description: Prime Eagle Point Townhouse. Enjoy comfortable open concept modern living in this desirably upgraded well cared for home that shows like new. Euro style Kitchen w/island, stainless appliances; vinyl plank floor and so much more. 3 good size bedrooms up w/ 3 freshly updated bathrooms. Below is a recreation room, laundry room and flex space that makes a good home office or 4th bdrm. Quiet and private outdoor patio to relax. Unit views open green space from the back. Single car garage w/ parking for a second car in driveway. Complex has an outdoor pool and recreation ctr, near all levels of school. Close to skytrain, Rocky Pt Park, Coquitlam Centre, Breweries and Restaurants. 5 min walk for groceries and services. Plenty of Visitor parking . Open House Sunday Feb 1 from 2pm - 3pm
